InclusionRules.name: RA
InclusionRules.description: Participants with moderate to severe RA of greater than or equal to (>=6) months duration

InclusionRules.name: Prior non-biologic DMARD
InclusionRules.description: IInadequate response to at least one non-biologic DMARD

InclusionRules.name: Prior CHD
InclusionRules.description: History of Coronary Heart Disease (CHD) or presence of one or more additional CHD risk factors

InclusionRules.name: No biologic in past 4 weeks
InclusionRules.description: At the time of randomization, will have discontinued infliximab, adalimumab, golimumab, or certolizumab for >= 4 weeks

InclusionRules.name: No surgery in past 8 weeks
InclusionRules.description: No major surgery (including joint surgery or coronary revascularization) within 8 weeks prior to screening

InclusionRules.name: No rheumatic autoimmune disease other than RA
InclusionRules.description: No rheumatic autoimmune disease other than RA

InclusionRules.name: No inflammatory joint disease other than RA
InclusionRules.description: No history of or current inflammatory joint disease other than RA

InclusionRules.name: No current or recent serious uncontrolled concomitant cardiovascular or cerebrovascular disease
InclusionRules.description: No current or recent (within past 3 months) evidence of serious uncontrolled concomitant cardiovascular or cerebrovascular disease (myocardial infarction, revascularization, stroke, transient ischemic attack, or acute coronary syndrome)

InclusionRules.name: No uncontrolled disease state requiring corticosteroids
InclusionRules.description: No uncontrolled disease states, such as asthma or inflammatory bowel disease where flares are commonly treated with oral or parenteral corticosteroids

InclusionRules.name: No pre-existing central nervous system demyelinating or seizure disorder
InclusionRules.description: No pre-existing central nervous system demyelinating or seizure disorder

InclusionRules.name: No history of diverticuliti or diverticulosis requiring treatment
InclusionRules.description: No history of diverticulitis, diverticulosis requiring treatment or other lower gastrointestinal tract conditions that might predispose to perforations

InclusionRules.name: No current liver disease
InclusionRules.description: No current liver disease as determined by the investigator

InclusionRules.name: No active current infection
InclusionRules.description: No active current infection or history of recurrent bacterial, viral, fungal, mycobacterial or other infections, including but not limited to tuberculosis and atypical mycobacterial disease, hepatitis B and C, and herpes zoster, but excluding fungal infections of nail beds

InclusionRules.name: No oral antibiotics within two weeks prior
InclusionRules.description: No oral antibiotics within two weeks prior to screening visit

InclusionRules.name: No active tuberculosis (TB) requiring treatment within 3 years prior
InclusionRules.description: No active tuberculosis (TB) requiring treatment within 3 years prior to baseline

InclusionRules.name: No immunodeficiency
InclusionRules.description: No primary or secondary immunodeficiency (history of or currently active)

InclusionRules.name: No heart failure
InclusionRules.description: No moderate to severe heart failure

InclusionRules.name: No prior malignant disease
InclusionRules.description: No evidence of active malignant disease, malignancies diagnosed within the previous 10 years (including hematologic malignancies and solid tumors, except basal cell carcinoma of the skin that has been excised and cured), or breast cancer diagnosed within the previous 20 years

InclusionRules.name: No alcohol, drug or chemical abuse within the 6 months prior
InclusionRules.description: No history of alcohol, drug or chemical abuse within the 6 months prior to screening

InclusionRules.name: No latex allergy
InclusionRules.description: No participants with a history of allergic reactions to latex

InclusionRules.name: No prior non-TNFi biologics
InclusionRules.description:
No previous treatment with non-tumor necrosis factor (non-TNF)-inhibitor
biologic therapy

InclusionRules.name: No immunization in 4 weeks prior
InclusionRules.description: No immunization with a live/attenuated vaccine within 4 weeks prior to baseline visit

InclusionRules.name: No prior alkylating agents or lymphoid irradiation
InclusionRules.description: No previous treatment with alkylating agents, such as cyclophosphamide or chlorambucil, or with total lymphoid irradiation
